movies.title: The Disaster Artist
movies.plot: An aspiring actor in Hollywood meets an enigmatic stranger by the name of Tommy Wiseau, the meeting leads the actor down a path nobody could have predicted; creating the worst movie ever made.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 31 wins & 81 nominations.

events.title: Tommy Wiseau's debut movie, The Room, premieres in Los Angeles
